verses.name: Proverbs 14:18
verses.text: The simple inherit folly: but the prudent are crowned with knowledge.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:19
verses.text: The evil bow before the good; and the wicked at the gates of the righteous.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:20
verses.text: The poor is hated even of his own neighbour: but the rich hath many friends.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:21
verses.text: He that despiseth his neighbour sinneth: but he that hath mercy on the poor, happy is he.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:22
verses.text: Do they not err that devise evil? but mercy and truth shall be to them that devise good.

verses.name: Proverbs 14:23
verses.text: In all labour there is profit: but the talk of the lips tendeth only to penury.
